Friends.name: Friends
Friends.Description: I've had the same group of friends since 2015. We were two different groups of girls and boys that collided and we've been close ever since. We've grown up together and they are the best people to spend time with.

Family.name: Family
Family.Description: My family has always been there for me whenever I need help and to guide me through difficult times in my life. They know exactly how to make me laugh when I'm feeling down.

Travel.name: Travel
Travel.Description: I love to travel and discover new things I've never seen before. I'm privileged that I've been able to visit multiple countries already with my family. It makes me feel happy to travel; to experience new cultures and meet new people.
